Until Spring 2018

Due to Superstorm Sandy restoration and repair work, please allow additional travel time.

Reminder: QM2, QM4 , QM5 and QM6 buses do not operate overnight.

Via 42 St

line.text:
Delays  Posted: 10/21/2017 11:04AM

QMT: TRAFFIC DELAYS: MANHATTAN BOUND.

line.name: Babylon
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 10/20/2017  9:00PM

Post Avenue Bridge Installation Work Alters Babylon Branch Weekend Train Schedules, Oct. 21-22

Â 

Special weekend timetables will be in effect for all LIRR branches on Saturday, Oct. 21 and Sunday, Oct. 22 to accommodate the installation of the new Post Avenue Bridge in Westbury. Departure and arrival times for ALL weekend trains will change. Departure times for connecting trains at Jamaica will also be affected.

Â 

Babylon Branch customers are advised to pick up a copy of the special Babylon Branch weekend timetable dated Oct. 21-22, 2017 or see https://goo.gl/FPFJdr.

For additional information regarding the Post Avenue Bridge Installation weekend, link here: http://web.mta.info/supplemental/lirr/postavenuebridgeinstallation.htm

line.name: Port Jefferson
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 10/20/2017  9:00PM

Buses Replace Port Jefferson Branch Weekend Trains between Mineola and Hicksville due to Post Avenue Bridge Replacement Work, Oct. 21-22

Â 

Avoid busing and delays by using the Hempstead, Montauk or Babylon Branches

Â 

Installation of the new Post Avenue Bridge in Westbury will require a suspension of all train service

between Hicksville and Mineola for the entire weekend of Oct. 21-22. Buses will replace trains between Hicksville and Mineola from 12:45 AM Saturday, Oct. 21 until 12:45 AM Monday, Oct. 23.

Â 

Westbound customers will take trains to Hicksville and transfer to buses bound for Mineola, where train service will resume.

Â 

Eastbound customers will take trains to Mineola and transfer to buses bound for Hicksville, where train service

will resume.

Â 

Additional Info/Travel Tips:

  • Customers traveling to/from Carle Place and Westbury stations will be bused to either Mineola or Hicksville, depending upon their direction of travel.

  • Service between Huntington and Hicksville is reduced to hourly instead of the usual half-hourly intervals

  • Trains between Huntington and Port Jefferson will run every two hours instead of the usual 90-minute intervals.

  • Plan for up to 60 minutes of additional travel time.

  • Capacity is limited on alternate bus service. To avoid busing and delays, customers are strongly advised to use the Hempstead, Montauk or Babylon Branches.

  • Sign up for Customer Email Alerts at www.mymtaalerts.com or download the TrainTime app

  • Listen for announcements at stations

Â 

See https://goo.gl/RHwhrw for the Special Port Jefferson Branch Timetable dated Oct. 21-22. Â For additional information regarding the Post Avenue Bridge Installation weekend, link here: http://web.mta.info/supplemental/lirr/postavenuebridgeinstallation.htm

Â

line.name: Ronkonkoma
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 10/20/2017  9:00PM

Major Weekend Service Changes for Ronkonkoma Branch Customers, Oct. 21-22

Â 

Avoid busing and delays by using the Hempstead, Montauk or Babylon Branches

Â 

Installation of the new Post Avenue Bridge in Westbury will require a suspension of all train service between Hicksville and Mineola for the entire weekend of Oct. 21-22. As a result, most Ronkonkoma trains will be diverted, while buses will replace some overnight and early morning trains between Mineola and Hicksville.

Â 

The weekend changes include:

Â 

7 AM - Midnight

  • Ronkonkoma through Farmingdale customers will travel to/from Penn Station by train without transfers, along a route that includes the Central and Babylon branches.

  • Bethpage customers will be bused to/from Mineola.

  • Plan for up to 44 minutes of added travel time.

    Â 

    Midnight - 7 AM

  • Buses replace trains between Mineola and Hicksville.

  • Plan for up to 60 minutes of added travel time.

    Â 

    Â 

    Additional Info/Travel Tips:

  • To avoid busing and delays, use the Montauk, Babylon or Hempstead branches.

  • Sign up for Customer Email Alerts at www.mymtaalerts.com or download the TrainTime app

  • Listen for announcements at stations

See https://goo.gl/RHwhrw Â for the Special Ronkonkoma Branch Timetable dated Oct. 21-22. Â For additional information regarding the Post Avenue Bridge Installation weekend, link here: http://web.mta.info/supplemental/lirr/postavenuebridgeinstallation.htm

line.name: Wassaic
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 10/20/2017  8:58PM

Weekend substitute bus service will be in effect between Southeast and Wassaic for select trains, Friday, Oct. 20, and for all trains Saturday, Oct. 21 and Sunday, Oct. 22 to accommodate track work. See a bus schedule at http://ow.ly/TAis30fpgn5 Buses will operate 15-30 minutes earlier than scheduled trains. Listen for announcements and check Local or Express bus service to your destination while boarding. Thank you for your patience while we complete these important infrastructure improvements.

Pascack Valley Line: Buses Replace Trains due to Grade Crossing Repairs and Signal & Track Maintenance Work - Sunday, September 17 to Saturday, October 28, 2017. Visit NJ Transit.com for more information.
